greenmirror.placements

Class EdgePlacement

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenmirror.Placement
      • greenmirror.placements.EdgePlacement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class EdgePlacement
extends Placement
    A placement type that indicates that something should be placed on the edge of something else at a specific angle. The angle is given in degrees and the zero-angle start at the exact top. On a clock this would be the on the number 12. A positive angle means turning clockwise.
    Author:
    Karim El Assal

    • Field Summary

      Fields
